verses.verse: You, <S%H1121><s%> son of man, <S%H120><s%> prophesy <S%H5012><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> You mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because the enemy <S%H341><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> against you, <S%H1889><s%> Aha! and, <S%H5769><s%> The ancient high places <S%H1116><s%> are ours in possession; <S%H4181><s%>

therefore prophesy, <S%H5012><s%> and say, <S%H559><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because, <S%H8074><s%> even because they have made you desolate, and swallowed you up <S%H7602><s%> on every side, <S%H5439><s%> that you might be a possession <S%H4181><s%> to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and you are taken up <S%H5927><s%> in the lips <S%H8193><s%> of talkers, <S%H3956><s%> and the evil report <S%H1681><s%> of the people; <S%H5971><s%>

therefore, <S%H2022><s%> you mountains of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H136><s%> to the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the watercourses <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> to the desolate <S%H8074><s%> wastes <S%H2723><s%> and to the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are forsaken, <S%H5800><s%> which are become a prey <S%H957><s%> and derision <S%H3933><s%> to the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are all around; <S%H5439><s%>

therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> Surely in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> have I spoken <S%H1696><s%> against the residue <S%H7611><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and against all Edom, <S%H123><s%> that have appointed <S%H5414><s%> my land <S%H776><s%> to themselves for a possession <S%H4181><s%> with the joy <S%H8057><s%> of all their heart, <S%H3824><s%> with despite <S%H7589><s%> of soul, <S%H3824><s%> to cast it out <S%H4054><s%> for a prey. <S%H957><s%>

Therefore prophesy <S%H5012><s%> concerning the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and tell <S%H559><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> and to the hills, <S%H1389><s%> to the watercourses <S%H650><s%> and to the valleys, <S%H1516><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H1696><s%> I have spoken in my jealousy <S%H7068><s%> and in my wrath, <S%H2534><s%> because you have borne <S%H5375><s%> the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the nations: <S%H1471><s%>

therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> I have <S%H5375><s%> sworn, <S%H3027><s%> saying, <S%H1471><s%> Surely the nations that are around <S%H5439><s%> you, <S%H5375><s%> they shall bear their shame. <S%H3639><s%>

But you, <S%H2022><s%> mountains of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> you shall shoot forth <S%H5414><s%> your branches, <S%H6057><s%> and yield <S%H5375><s%> your fruit <S%H6529><s%> to my people <S%H5971><s%> Israel; <S%H3478><s%> for they are at hand <S%H7126><s%> to come. <S%H935><s%>
For, <S%H6437><s%> behold, I am for you, and I will turn into you, <S%H5647><s%> and you shall be tilled and sown; <S%H2232><s%>

and I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> men <S%H120><s%> on you, <S%H1004><s%> all the house of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> even all of it; <S%H5892><s%> and the cities shall be inhabited, <S%H3427><s%> and the waste <S%H2723><s%> places shall be built; <S%H1129><s%>

and I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> on you man <S%H120><s%> and animal; <S%H929><s%> and they shall increase <S%H7235><s%> and be fruitful; <S%H6509><s%> and I will cause you to be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> after your former estate, <S%H6927><s%> and will do better <S%H2895><s%> to you than at your beginnings: <S%H7221><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

Yes, <S%H120><s%> I will cause men to walk <S%H3212><s%> on you, <S%H5971><s%> even my people Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and they shall possess <S%H3423><s%> you, <S%H5159><s%> and you shall be their inheritance, and you shall no more <S%H3254><s%> henceforth bereave them of children. <S%H7921><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> Because they say <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H398><s%> You are a devourer of men, <S%H120><s%> and have been a bereaver <S%H7921><s%> of your nation; <S%H1471><s%>
therefore you shall devour <S%H398><s%> men <S%H120><s%> no more, <S%H7921><s%> neither bereave your nation <S%H1471><s%> any more, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh; <S%H3069><s%>

neither will I let you hear <S%H8085><s%> any more the shame <S%H3639><s%> of the nations, <S%H1471><s%> neither shall you bear <S%H5375><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> any more, <S%H1471><s%> neither shall you cause your nation to stumble <S%H3782><s%> any more, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> when the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in their own land, <S%H127><s%> they defiled <S%H2930><s%> it by their way <S%H1870><s%> and by their doings: <S%H5949><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me was as the uncleanness <S%H2932><s%> of a woman in her impurity. <S%H5079><s%>

Therefore I poured <S%H8210><s%> out my wrath <S%H2534><s%> on them for the blood <S%H1818><s%> which they had poured <S%H8210><s%> out on the land, <S%H776><s%> and because they had defiled <S%H2930><s%> it with their idols; <S%H1544><s%>

and I scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and they were dispersed <S%H2219><s%> through the countries: <S%H776><s%> according to their way <S%H1870><s%> and according to their doings <S%H5949><s%> I judged them. <S%H8199><s%>

When they came <S%H935><s%> to the nations, <S%H1471><s%> where they went, <S%H935><s%> they profaned <S%H2490><s%> my holy <S%H6944><s%> name; <S%H8034><s%> in that men said <S%H559><s%> of them, <S%H5971><s%> These are the people of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and are gone forth <S%H3318><s%> out of his land. <S%H776><s%>

But I had respect <S%H2550><s%> for my holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> had profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> where they went. <S%H935><s%>

Therefore tell <S%H559><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H136><s%> I don't <S%H6213><s%> do this for your sake, <S%H1004><s%> house of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> but for my holy <S%H6944><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> where you went. <S%H935><s%>

I will sanctify <S%H6942><s%> my great <S%H1419><s%> name, <S%H8034><s%> which has been profaned <S%H2490><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> which you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> in their midst; <S%H8432><s%> and the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall be sanctified <S%H6942><s%> in you before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

For I will take <S%H3947><s%> you from among <S%H4480><s%> the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and gather <S%H6908><s%> you out of all the countries, <S%H776><s%> and will bring <S%H935><s%> you into your own land. <S%H127><s%>

I will sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> on you, <S%H2891><s%> and you shall be clean: from all your filthiness, <S%H2932><s%> and from all your idols, <S%H1544><s%> will I cleanse you. <S%H2891><s%>

I will also give <S%H5414><s%> you a new <S%H2319><s%> heart, <S%H3820><s%> and I will put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you; <S%H5493><s%> and I will take away the stony <S%H68><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> out of your flesh, <S%H1320><s%> and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you a heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh. <S%H1320><s%>

I will put <S%H5414><s%> my Spirit <S%H7307><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you, <S%H6213><s%> and cause you to walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and do them. <S%H6213><s%>
You shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> to your fathers; <S%H1><s%> and you shall be my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I will be your God. <S%H430><s%>

I will save <S%H3467><s%> you from all your uncleanness: <S%H2932><s%> and I will call <S%H7121><s%> for the grain, <S%H1715><s%> and will multiply <S%H7235><s%> it, <S%H5414><s%> and lay no famine on you. <S%H7458><s%>

I will multiply <S%H7235><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the tree, <S%H6086><s%> and the increase <S%H8570><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> that you may receive <S%H3947><s%> no more the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%> among the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

Then you shall remember <S%H2142><s%> your evil <S%H7451><s%> ways, <S%H1870><s%> and your doings <S%H4611><s%> that were not good; <S%H2896><s%> and you shall loathe <S%H6962><s%> yourselves in your own sight <S%H6440><s%> for your iniquities <S%H5771><s%> and for your abominations. <S%H8441><s%>

Nor for your sake do <S%H6213><s%> I this, <S%H5002><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh, <S%H136><s%> be it known <S%H3045><s%> to you: <S%H954><s%> be ashamed and confounded <S%H3637><s%> for your ways, <S%H1870><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> that I cleanse <S%H2891><s%> you from all your iniquities, <S%H5771><s%> I will cause the cities <S%H5892><s%> to be inhabited, <S%H3427><s%> and the waste <S%H2723><s%> places shall be built. <S%H1129><s%>
The land <S%H776><s%> that was desolate <S%H8074><s%> shall be tilled, <S%H5647><s%> whereas it was a desolation <S%H8077><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all who passed by. <S%H5674><s%>

They shall say, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H1977><s%> land <S%H776><s%> that was desolate <S%H8074><s%> has become like the garden <S%H1588><s%> of Eden; <S%H5731><s%> and the waste <S%H2720><s%> and desolate <S%H8074><s%> and ruined <S%H2040><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> are fortified <S%H1219><s%> and inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>

Then the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are left <S%H7604><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have built <S%H1129><s%> the ruined <S%H2040><s%> places, <S%H5193><s%> and planted that which was desolate: <S%H8074><s%> I, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh, have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, <S%H6213><s%> and I will do it.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> For this, <S%H1875><s%> moreover, will I be inquired of by the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> it for them: <S%H7235><s%> I will increase them with men <S%H120><s%> like a flock. <S%H6629><s%>

As the flock <S%H6629><s%> for sacrifice, <S%H6944><s%> as the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> in her appointed feasts, <S%H4150><s%> so shall the waste <S%H2720><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> be filled <S%H4392><s%> with flocks <S%H6629><s%> of men; <S%H120><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
